Text: Hi, everyone! The first thing you have to do is to extract these files with Winrar or 7zip and secondly (after extracting) you have to burn them on DVD5 Disc with Nero (for example).

having trouble playing 202?  

Just drag all the files (located on the three different iso files) into a folder that you have created calling it whatever you like.  there'll be some double ups, so just ignore them.  With all the iso files still open now Double click 202 in your newly created folder and bingo it works :)
